8th Pay Commission may give a 186% boost to pensions. Find out how The fitment factor plays an important role in calculating the updated pay and benefits and is likely to be in the range between 2.28 and 2.86 for the 8th Pay Commission.

How to achieve minimum credit score for getting personal loan? Details hereThe higher the credit score, the greater are the chances for the approval of your loan requests.

InterGlobe Aviation Q3 results: IndiGo operator's net profit falls by 18%Indigo Q3 results: The net profit for the aviation company dropped by 18% to Rs 2,449 crore when compared to Rs 2,998 crore in the same quarter a year ago.

Budget 2025: EV sector pushes for tech investments and smart mobility solutionsExperts anticipate that Budget 2025 would introduce policies that would boost EV sales across the country and help India achieve its goal of reducing carbon emissions by one billion tonnes by 2030.

Sensex, Nifty fall amid volatility; energy and pharma lead lossesShare Market: The S&P BSE Sensex shed 329.92 points to close at 76,190.46, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 113.15 points to end at 23,092.20.
Amul cuts milk prices by Re 1 per litre across IndiaThe reduction will only be applicable to 1-litre packs. Previously, in June 2024, Amul had increased milk prices by Rs 2 per litre.

India-US relationship beyond personalities: Fareed Zakaria on Trump 2.0Fareed Zakaria shared his insights on the political shift in the United States and the seismic changes it is expected to bring geopolitically and economically across the world.

Adani Green Energy shares fall as Sri Lanka cancels power purchase dealAdani Green Energy shares fell after the news of Sri Lanka cancelling the power purchase deal to hit the day's low of Rs 1,008, crashing over 6% from the day's high.

Tata Electronics buys 60% controlling stake in Pegatron IndiaTEPL, which is a wholly-owned subsidiary of Tata Sons, said the latest acquisition aligns with Tata Sons' Chairman N Chandrasekaran's vision of investments by the Tata Group in electronics manufacturing.

Why are markets volatile, and should you be worried? 3 things to know Sensex scaled to 76,985.95, reaching the day's high, a jump of over 500 points, but was trading at 76,621.03 as of 1 PM. Nifty has also gone about in the same manner.

Paytm denies ED probe in crypto scam, calls reports 'factually incorrect'Paytm Latest News: Paytm's clarification came after a few media reports claimed that the ED is investigating the fintech firm and other payment gateways in a cryptocurrency scam.

Explained: Why Paytm share price tumbled nearly 9% todayPaytm share price: The shares of the company fell nearly 9% to hit a day's low of Rs 773.90. At 12:18 pm, shares of the fintech company stabilised a bit to trade 2.27% higher at Rs 829.70.
Why did Cyient CEO Karthikeyan Natarajan resign?The resignation of Cyient's CEO Karthikeyan Natarajan was a major reason that led to the sharp decline in the company's share price.

HUL to acquire stake in Minimalist for Rs 2,670 crore; Peak XV bags 10X gainsHUL has acquired a 90.5% stake in Minimalist for Rs 2,670 crore, making it one of the biggest acquisitions in the country's startup ecosystem.

Cyient share price falls 20% to hit 52-week low. What triggered Friday's crash?Cyient stock price: At around 10:21 am, shares of Cyient were down 17.96% to Rs 1,438 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE). In early trade, shares of the IT company fell as much as 20% to hit a 52-week low of Rs 1,402.25.

Explained: Why Dr Reddy's share price cracked 6% in early tradeDr Reddy's Laboratories Stock Price: Dr Reddy's shares tumbled up to 6% in early trade and at 9:46 am, they were trading 4.35% lower at Rs 1,233.25 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE).

entertainment.headline: Chris Martin pauses My Universe to ensure fan safety at Ahmedabad showDuring Sunday's concert in Ahmedabad, Coldplay's lead singer Chris Martin paused mid-performance to ensure the safety of a fan. The moment was captured during the show's live-streaming on Disney+ Hotstar.

Chris Martin jokes he is from Telangana, calls Coldplay an Indian bandDuring their recent performance in India, Coldplay's lead singer, Chris Martin, joked about being born here. The British rock band concluded their India tour with a final concert in Ahmedabad on Sunday.

Chris Martin sings Everglow with fan couple at Ahmedabad concertDuring the Ahmedabad concert, Chris Martin performed Coldplay's popular song Everglow with a fan couple. The heartfelt moment was streamed live on Disney+ Hotstar.

Guru Randhawa visits Maha Kumbh: Blessed to take a sacred dip in Maa GangaSinger Guru Randhawa visited the Maha Kumbh Mela 2025 in Prayagraj and took a sacred dip in the Ganga. He wrote about starting a new journey.

Suits LA trailer: Stephen Amell takes you to 'west coast', Harvey Spector reappearsThe trailer of Suits LA teased actor Gabriel Macht's return as Harvey Spector in the new spin-off series. Actor Stephen Amell leads the show, which is going to be premiered next month.

Coldplay in India: A rollercoaster of excitement, chaos, and disappointmentColdplay's first three concerts in India have left fans with mixed feelings. While tickets for all the five shows sold out quickly, fans all over the country complained about the issues surrounding the Mumbai concerts.

Newtopia trailer: BLACKPINK's Jisoo to headline hilarious romantic zombie dramaThe much-anticipated trailer for Newtopia is out, featuring BLACKPINK's Jisoo and actor Park Jeong-min. The duo navigates a zombie outbreak in this gripping drama based on Han Sang-woon's novel Influenza.

general news.headline: Republic Day parade: 'Nari shakti', military firepower on display at Kartavya PathRepublic Day celebrations, led by President Droupadi Murmu, are underway with tens of thousands attending the grand parade at Kartavya Path. Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto is the chief guest this year.

Indonesian President's 'Indian DNA' quip at dinner leaves PM Modi in splits At a dinner hosted in his honour by President Droupadi Murmu, Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto joked about his recent discovery of Indian ancestry, revealing that a DNA test had shown his connection to India.

Jasprit Bumrah stars at Coldplay concert, Chris Martin dedicates special songJasprit Bumrah attended the Coldplay concert in Ahmedabad on Sunday. Bumrah was seen wearing a black shirt and having a gala time at the Narendra Modi Stadium.

Mamata Banerjee fumes after Bengal cops' band denied entry into Raj BhavanMamata Banerjee voiced strong displeasure upon discovering that the Kolkata Police band was initially barred from entering the Raj Bhavan during the Republic Day celebrations.

Tamil predates sand, stone-age: Why India should embrace findings and dig deeperTamil Nadu's archaeology department recently released stunning evidence that Chief Minister MK Stalin said showed the Iron Age beginning there. Stalin lost no time in locating the new findings in the political context of the Aryan-versus-Dravidian debate. Regardless of who is on which side of these debates, it is time the Archaeological Survey of India (ASI) ended its criminal neglect of an unfolding old civilisation. We need a massive national effort to unearth the secrets of this land. After all, Tamil Nadu is a part of India.

Manish Sisodia will return as Deputy Chief Minister if AAP wins: Arvind KejriwalArvind Kejriwal declared on Sunday that Manish Sisodia would reassume the role of Deputy Chief Minister if AAP secures victory in the Delhi Assembly elections. Sisodia has been fielded from the Jangpura Assembly constituency.

Pics: PM's turban to desi weapons, 76th Republic Day parade is a sight to beholdIndia marked its 76th Republic Day with a parade at Kartavya Path. The event showcased military equipment, including 125 mm smoothbore guns, 7.62 mm machine guns, 12.7 mm anti-aircraft guns, and tanks.  Agniban, a missile system, was also featured during the procession. Helicopters from the Indian Air Force carried the Indian and Indonesian flags over the venue.

United have welcomed the support and feel it could lead to a major redevelopment around the area in which Old Trafford is located at the moment.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.
